amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce spending by $18,579,000,000 in order to reflect FY 2008 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in part A of House Report 111-578 to reduce spending by $18,579,000,000 in order to reflect FY 2008 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jordan (OH) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 265 (Roll no. 493).
